verses.verse: Then <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%>
"How long will you <S%H3013>torment<s%> <S%H5315>me,<s%> and <S%H1792>crush<s%> me with <S%H4405>words?<s%>
You have <S%H3637>reproached<s%> me <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H6471>times.<s%> You <S%H954>aren't<s%> ashamed that you attack <S%H1970>me.<s%>
If it is <S%H551>true<s%> that I have <S%H7686>erred,<s%> my <S%H4879>error<s%> remains with <S%H3885>myself.<s%>
If <S%H551>indeed<s%> you will <S%H1431>magnify<s%> yourselves against <S%H3198>me,<s%> and plead against me my <S%H2781>reproach;<s%>
<S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H645>now<s%> that <S%H433>God<s%> has <S%H5791>subverted<s%> <S%H5362>me,<s%> and has surrounded me with his <S%H4686>net.<s%>
<S%H6817>"Behold,<s%> I cry out of <S%H2555>wrong,<s%> but I am not <S%H6030>heard.<s%> I <S%H7768>cry<s%> for <S%H4941>help,<s%> but there is no justice.
He has walled <S%H1443>up<s%> my <S%H734>way<s%> so that I <S%H5674>can't<s%> pass, and has <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%> in my <S%H5410>paths.<s%>
He has <S%H6584>stripped<s%> me of my <S%H3519>glory,<s%> and <S%H5493>taken<s%> the <S%H5850>crown<s%> from my <S%H5850>head.<s%>
He has <S%H5422>broken<s%> me down on every <S%H5439>side,<s%> and I am <S%H3212>gone.<s%> My <S%H8615>hope<s%> he has <S%H5265>plucked<s%> up like a <S%H6086>tree.<s%>
He has also <S%H2734>kindled<s%> his <S%H639>wrath<s%> against <S%H2803>me.<s%> He counts me among his <S%H6862>adversaries.<s%>
His <S%H1416>troops<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> on <S%H3162>together,<s%> <S%H5549>build<s%> a <S%H1870>siege<s%> ramp against <S%H2583>me,<s%> and encamp <S%H5439>around<s%> my <S%H168>tent.<s%>
"He has <S%H7368>put<s%> my <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H3045>me.<s%> My acquaintances are wholly estranged from <S%H2114>me.<s%>
My <S%H7138>relatives<s%> have gone <S%H2308>away.<s%> My familiar <S%H3045>friends<s%> have forgotten <S%H7911>me.<s%>
Those who <S%H1481>dwell<s%> in my <S%H1004>house,<s%> and my <S%H519>maids,<s%> <S%H2803>count<s%> me for a <S%H2114>stranger.<s%> I am an <S%H5237>alien<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight.<s%>
I <S%H7121>call<s%> to my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and he gives me no <S%H6030>answer.<s%> I <S%H2603>beg<s%> him <S%H1119>with<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
My <S%H7307>breath<s%> is <S%H2114>offensive<s%> to my <S%H802>wife.<s%> I am <S%H2589>loathsome<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of my own <S%H990>mother.<s%>
Even young <S%H5759>children<s%> <S%H3988>despise<s%> <S%H6965>me.<s%> If I arise, they speak against <S%H1696>me.<s%>
All my <S%H5475>familiar<s%> <S%H4962>friends<s%> <S%H8581>abhor<s%> <S%H157>me.<s%> They whom I loved have turned against <S%H2015>me.<s%>
My <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H1692>stick<s%> to my <S%H5785>skin<s%> and to my <S%H1320>flesh.<s%> I have <S%H4422>escaped<s%> by the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of my <S%H8127>teeth.<s%>
"Have <S%H2603>pity<s%> on <S%H2603>me,<s%> have pity on <S%H7453>me,<s%> you my friends; for the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H433>God<s%> has touched <S%H5060>me.<s%>
Why do you <S%H7291>persecute<s%> me as <S%H410>God,<s%> and are not <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with my <S%H1320>flesh?<s%>
"Oh <S%H5414>that<s%> my <S%H4405>words<s%> were <S%H645>now<s%> <S%H3789>written!<s%> Oh <S%H5414>that<s%> they were <S%H2710>inscribed<s%> in a <S%H5612>book!<s%>
That with an <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H5842>pen<s%> and <S%H5777>lead<s%> they were <S%H2672>engraved<s%> in the <S%H6697>rock<s%> <S%H5703>forever!<s%>
But as for <S%H3045>me,<s%> I know that my <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%> <S%H2416>lives.<s%> In the <S%H314>end,<s%> he will <S%H6965>stand<s%> upon the <S%H6083>earth.<s%>
<S%H310>After<s%> my <S%H5785>skin<s%> is <S%H5362>destroyed,<s%> then in my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall I <S%H2372>see<s%> <S%H433>God,<s%>

Whom <S%H2372>I,<s%> even I, shall see on my <S%H5869>side.<s%> My eyes shall <S%H7200>see,<s%> and not as a <S%H2114>stranger.<s%> "My <S%H3629>heart<s%> is <S%H3615>consumed<s%> within <S%H2436>me.<s%>
If you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H7291><s%> 'How we will persecute <S%H8328>him!<s%>' because the root of the <S%H1697>matter<s%> is found in <S%H4672>me,<s%>

be <S%H1481>afraid<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> for <S%H2534>wrath<s%> brings the <S%H5771>punishments<s%> <S%H6440>of<s%> the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> there is a <S%H1779>judgment.<s%>"
